054public class SQLQueryVisitorTest {
055
056  private static final OccurrenceSearchParameter PARAM = OccurrenceSearchParameter.CATALOG_NUMBER;
057  private static final OccurrenceSearchParameter PARAM2 =
058      OccurrenceSearchParameter.INSTITUTION_CODE;
059
060  private final SQLQueryVisitor visitor =
061      new SQLQueryVisitor(new OccurrenceTermsMapper(), "defaultChecklistKey");
062
063  @Test
064  public void testComplexQuery() throws QueryBuildingException {
065    Predicate aves = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "212", false);
066    Predicate passer =
067        new LikePredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.SCIENTIFIC_NAME, "Passer*", false);
068    Predicate UK = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COUNTRY, "GB", false);
069    Predicate before1989 = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, "1989");
070    Predicate georeferencedPredicate =
071        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.HAS_COORDINATE, "true", false);
072
073    ConjunctionPredicate p =
074        new ConjunctionPredicate(List.of(aves, UK, passer, before1989, georeferencedPredicate));
075    String where = visitor.buildQuery(p);
076    assertEquals(
077        "(((stringArrayContains(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], '212', true))) AND (countrycode = 'GB') AND (lower(scientificname) LIKE lower('Passer%')) AND (year <= 1989) AND (hascoordinate = true))",
078        where);
079  }
080
081  @Test
082  public void testMoreComplexQuery() throws QueryBuildingException {
083    Predicate taxon1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "1", false);
084    Predicate taxon2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "2", false);
085    DisjunctionPredicate taxa = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(taxon1, taxon2));
086
087    Predicate basis =
088        new InPredicate<>(
089            OccurrenceSearchParameter.BASIS_OF_RECORD,
090            List.of("HUMAN_OBSERVATION", "MACHINE_OBSERVATION"),
091            false);
092
093    Predicate UK = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COUNTRY, "GB", false);
094    Predicate IE = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.COUNTRY, "IE", false);
095    DisjunctionPredicate countries = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(UK, IE));
096
097    Predicate before1989 = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, "1989");
098    Predicate in2000 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, "2000", false);
099    DisjunctionPredicate years = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(before1989, in2000));
100
101    ConjunctionPredicate p = new ConjunctionPredicate(List.of(taxa, basis, countries, years));
102    String where = visitor.buildQuery(p);
103    assertEquals(
104        "((((stringArrayContains(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], '1', true)) OR (stringArrayContains(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], '2', true)))) "
105            + "AND ((basisofrecord IN('HUMAN_OBSERVATION', 'MACHINE_OBSERVATION'))) "
106            + "AND ((countrycode IN(\'GB\', \'IE\'))) "
107            + "AND (((year <= 1989) OR (year = 2000))))",
108        where);
109  }
110
111  @Test
112  public void testConjunctionPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
113    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", false);
114    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM2, "value_2", false);
115
116    ConjunctionPredicate p = new ConjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
117    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
118    assertEquals(
119        "((lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value_1\')) AND (lower(institutioncode) = lower(\'value_2\')))",
120        query);
121  }
122
123  @Test
124  public void testDisjunctionPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
125    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", false);
126    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM2, "value_2", false);
127
128    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
129    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
130    assertEquals(
131        "((lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value_1\')) OR (lower(institutioncode) = lower(\'value_2\')))",
132        query);
133  }
134
135  @Test
136  public void testDisjunctionToInPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
137    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", false);
138    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_2", false);
139
140    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
141    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
142    assertEquals("(lower(catalognumber) IN(lower(\'value_1\'), lower(\'value_2\')))", query);
143  }
144
145  @Test
146  public void testDisjunctionToInTaxonPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
147    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "1", false);
148    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "2", false);
149
150    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
151    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
152    assertEquals(
153        "((stringArrayContains(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], '1', true)) OR (stringArrayContains(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], '2', true)))",
154        query);
155  }
156
157  @Test
158  public void testDisjunctionToInGadmGidPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
159    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID, "IRL_1", false);
160    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID, "GBR.2_1", false);
161
162    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
163    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
164    assertEquals(
165        "(level0gid IN('IRL_1', 'GBR.2_1') OR level1gid IN('IRL_1', 'GBR.2_1') OR level2gid IN('IRL_1', 'GBR.2_1') OR level3gid IN('IRL_1', 'GBR.2_1'))",
166        query);
167  }
168
169  @Test
170  public void testDisjunctionMediaTypePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
171    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.MEDIA_TYPE, "StillImage", false);
172    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.MEDIA_TYPE, "Sound", false);
173
174    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
175    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
176    assertEquals(
177        "(stringArrayContains(mediatype,'StillImage',true) OR stringArrayContains(mediatype,'Sound',true))",
178        query);
179  }
180
181  @Test
182  public void testDisjunctionVerbatimToInPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
183    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", true);
184    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_2", true);
185
186    DisjunctionPredicate p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
187    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
188    assertEquals("(catalognumber IN('value_1', 'value_2'))", query);
189
190    Predicate p3 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_3", false);
191
192    p = new DisjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2, p3));
193    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
194    assertEquals(
195        "((catalognumber = 'value_1') OR (catalognumber = 'value_2') OR (lower(catalognumber) = lower('value_3')))",
196        query);
197  }
198
199  @Test
200  public void testEqualsPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
201    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value", false);
202    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
203    assertEquals("lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value\')", query);
204  }
205
206  @Test
207  public void testEqualsPredicateGadmGid() throws QueryBuildingException {
208    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID, "IRL_1", false);
209
210    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
211    assertEquals(
212        "(level0gid = 'IRL_1' OR level1gid = 'IRL_1' OR level2gid = 'IRL_1' OR level3gid = 'IRL_1')",
213        query);
214  }
215
216  @Test
217  public void testLikePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
218    // NB: ? and * are wildcards (translated to SQL _ and %), so literal _ and % are escaped.
219    Predicate p = new LikePredicate<>(PARAM, "v?l*ue_%", false);
220    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
221    assertEquals("lower(catalognumber) LIKE lower(\'v_l%ue\\_\\%\')", query);
222  }
223
224  @Test
225  public void testLikeVerbatimPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
226    Predicate p = new LikePredicate<>(PARAM, "v?l*ue_%", true);
227    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
228    assertEquals("catalognumber LIKE \'v_l%ue\\_\\%\'", query);
229  }
230
231  @Test
232  public void testEqualsVerbatimPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
233    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value", true);
234    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
235    assertEquals("catalognumber = \'value\'", query);
236  }
237
238  @Test
239  public void testEqualsArrayPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
240    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "value", false);
241    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
242    assertEquals("stringArrayContains(recordedby,'value',false)", query);
243
244    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "value", true);
245    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
246    assertEquals("stringArrayContains(recordedby,'value',true)", query);
247  }
248
249  @Test
250  public void testLikeArrayPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
251    // NB: ? and * are the wildcards here.
252    Predicate p = new LikePredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "v?l*ue_%", false);
253    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
254    assertEquals("stringArrayLike(recordedby,'v?l*ue_%',false)", query);
255
256    p = new LikePredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "v?l*ue_%", true);
257    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
258    assertEquals("stringArrayLike(recordedby,'v?l*ue_%',true)", query);
259  }

265    assertEquals("elevation >= 222", query);
266  }

278    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
279    assertEquals(
280        "(lower(catalognumber) IN(lower(\'value_1\'), lower(\'value_2\'), lower(\'value_3\')))",

288    assertEquals("(catalognumber IN(\'value_1\', \'value_2\', \'value_3\'))", query);

335  @Test
336  public void testNotPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
337    Predicate p = new NotPredicate(new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value", false));
338    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
339    assertEquals("NOT lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value\')", query);
340  }
341
342  @Test
343  public void testNotPredicateComplex() throws QueryBuildingException {
344    Predicate p1 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "value_1", false);
345    Predicate p2 = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM2, "value_2", false);
346
347    ConjunctionPredicate cp = new ConjunctionPredicate(List.of(p1, p2));
348
349    Predicate p = new NotPredicate(cp);
350    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
351    assertEquals(
352        "NOT ((lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'value_1\')) AND (lower(institutioncode) = lower(\'value_2\')))",
353        query);
354  }
355
356  @Test
357  public void testQuotes() throws QueryBuildingException {
358    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(PARAM, "my \'pleasure\'", false);
359    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
360    assertEquals("lower(catalognumber) = lower(\'my \\\'pleasure\\\'\')", query);
361
362    Predicate predicateRecordedBY =
363        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.RECORDED_BY, "Brian J O'Shea", false);
364    String queryRecordedBy = visitor.buildQuery(predicateRecordedBY);
365    assertEquals("stringArrayContains(recordedby,'Brian J O\\'Shea',false)", queryRecordedBy);
366
367    p = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ELEVATION, "101");
368    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
369    assertEquals("elevation <= 101", query);
370
371    p = new GreaterThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, "1998");
372    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
373    assertEquals("year > 1998", query);
374  }
375
376  @Test
377  public void testGeoDistancePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
378    Predicate p = new GeoDistancePredicate("30", "10", "10km");
379    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
380    assertEquals(
381        "(geoDistance(30.0, 10.0, '10.0km', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)", query);
382  }
383
384  @Test
385  public void testWithinPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
386    final String wkt = "POLYGON ((30 10, 10 20, 20 40, 40 40, 30 10))";
387    Predicate p = new WithinPredicate(wkt);
388    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
389    assertEquals("(contains('" + wkt + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)", query);
390  }
391
392  @Test
393  public void testLongerWithinPredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
394    final String wkt =
395        "POLYGON ((-21.4671921 65.441761, -21.3157028 65.9990267, -22.46732 66.4657148, -23.196803 66.3490242, -22.362113 66.2703732, -22.9758561 66.228119, -22.3831844 66.0933255, -22.424131 65.8374539, -23.4703372 66.1972321, -23.2565264 65.6767322, -24.5319933 65.5027259, -21.684764 65.4547893, -24.0482947 64.8794291, -21.3551366 64.3842337, -22.7053151 63.8001572, -19.1269971 63.3980322, -13.4948065 65.076438, -15.1872897 66.1073781, -14.5302343 66.3783121, -16.0235596 66.5371808, -21.4671921 65.441761))";
396    Predicate p = new WithinPredicate(wkt);
397    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
398    assertEquals(
399        "((decimallatitude >= 63.3980322 AND decimallatitude <= 66.5371808 AND (decimallongitude >= -24.5319933 AND decimallongitude <= -13.4948065)) AND contains('"
400            + wkt
401            + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
402        query);
403  }
404
405  @Test
406  public void testAntimeridianWithinPredicate() throws Exception {
407    // A rectangle over the Bering sea, shouldn't have any bounding box added
408    String wkt =
409        "POLYGON((-206.71875 39.20502, -133.59375 39.20502, -133.59375 77.26611, -206.71875 77.26611, -206.71875 39.20502))";
410    String query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wkt));
411    assertEquals("(contains('" + wkt + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)", query);
412  }
413
414  @Test
415  public void testAddedBoundingBoxes() throws Exception {
416    String query;
417
418    // A multipolygon around Taveuni, split over the antimeridian
419    String wktM =
420        "MULTIPOLYGON (((180 -16.658979090909092, 180 -17.12485513597339, 179.87915 -17.12058, 179.78577 -16.82899, 179.85168 -16.72643, 180 -16.658979090909092)), ((-180 -17.12485513597339, -180 -16.658979090909092, -179.8764 -16.60277, -179.75006 -16.86054, -179.89838 -17.12845, -180 -17.12485513597339)))";
421    String bbox =
422        "(decimallatitude >= -17.12845 AND decimallatitude <= -16.60277 AND (decimallongitude >= 179.78577 OR decimallongitude <= -179.75006))";
423    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktM));
424    assertEquals(
425        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
426        query);
427
428    // A polygon around Taveuni, Fiji, as portal16 produces it.
429    // Note the result still contains the multipolygon.
430    String wkt16 =
431        "POLYGON((-180.14832 -16.72643, -180.21423 -16.82899, -180.12085 -17.12058, -179.89838 -17.12845, -179.75006 -16.86054, -179.8764 -16.60277, -180.14832 -16.72643))";
432    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wkt16));
433    assertEquals(
434        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
435        query);
436
437    // Same place, but as Wicket draws it:
438    // Note the result still contains the same multipolygon.
439    String wktWk =
440        "POLYGON((179.85168 -16.72643, 179.78577 -16.82899, 179.87915 -17.12058, -179.89838 -17.12845, -179.75006 -16.86054, -179.8764 -16.60277, 179.85168 -16.72643))";
441    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktWk));
442    assertEquals(
443        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
444        query);
445
446    // Tiny areas scattered around the world, all in a single multipolygon.
447    // Requires bounding boxes to avoid very slow Hive performance.
448    String wktMM =
449        "MULTIPOLYGON (((-109.42861 -27.13333, -109.42861 -27.13666, -109.43138 -27.13666, -109.43138 -27.13333, -109.42861 -27.13333)), "
450            + "((-109.42236 -27.10919, -109.42236 -27.11191, -109.42541 -27.11191, -109.42541 -27.10919, -109.42236 -27.10919)), "
451            + "((-174.35146 -19.80528, -174.35146 -19.81829, -174.36338 -19.81829, -174.36338 -19.80528, -174.35146 -19.80528)), "
452            + "((-173.94525 -18.71444, -173.96472 -18.71444, -173.96472 -18.68694, -173.94525 -18.68694, -173.94525 -18.71444)), "
453            + "((-173.91655 -18.66372, -173.94041 -18.66372, -173.94041 -18.63616, -173.91655 -18.63616, -173.91655 -18.66372)))";
454    String bboxMM =
455        "(decimallatitude >= -27.13666 AND decimallatitude <= -18.63616 AND (decimallongitude >= -174.36338 AND decimallongitude <= -109.42236)) AND "
456            + "(((decimallatitude >= -27.13666 AND decimallatitude <= -27.13333 AND (decimallongitude >= -109.43138 AND decimallongitude <= -109.42861)) OR "
457            + "(decimallatitude >= -27.11191 AND decimallatitude <= -27.10919 AND (decimallongitude >= -109.42541 AND decimallongitude <= -109.42236)) OR "
458            + "(decimallatitude >= -19.81829 AND decimallatitude <= -19.80528 AND (decimallongitude >= -174.36338 AND decimallongitude <= -174.35146)) OR "
459            + "(decimallatitude >= -18.71444 AND decimallatitude <= -18.68694 AND (decimallongitude >= -173.96472 AND decimallongitude <= -173.94525)) OR "
460            + "(decimallatitude >= -18.66372 AND decimallatitude <= -18.63616 AND (decimallongitude >= -173.94041 AND decimallongitude <= -173.91655))))";
461    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktMM));
462    assertEquals(
463        "(" + bboxMM + " AND contains('" + wktMM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
464        query);
465  }
466
467  @Test
468  public void testWidePolygons() throws Exception {
469    String query;
470
471    // A polygon around Antarctica
472    String wktP =
473        "POLYGON ((180 -64.7, 180 -56.8, 180 -44.3, 173 -44.3, 173 -47.5, 170 -47.5, 157 -47.5, 157 -45.9, 150 -45.9, 150 -47.5, 143 -47.5, 143 -45.8, 140 -45.8, 140 -44.5, 137 -44.5, 137 -43, 135 -43, 135 -41.7, 131 -41.7, 131 -40.1, 115 -40.1, 92 -40.1, 92 -41.4, 78 -41.4, 78 -42.3, 69 -42.3, 69 -43.3, 47 -43.3, 47 -41.7, 30 -41.7, 12 -41.7, 12 -40.3, 10 -40.3, 10 -38.3, -5 -38.3, -5 -38.9, -9 -38.9, -9 -40.2, -13 -40.2, -13 -41.4, -21 -41.4, -21 -42.5, -39 -42.5, -39 -40.7, -49 -40.7, -49 -48.6, -54 -48.6, -54 -55.7, -62.79726 -55.7, -64 -55.7, -64 -57.8, -71 -57.8, -71 -58.9, -80 -58.9, -80 -40, -103.71094 -40.14844, -125 -40, -167 -40, -167 -42.6, -171 -42.6, -171 -44.3, -180 -44.3, -180 -56.8, -180 -64.7, -180 -80, -125 -80, -70 -80, 30 -80, 115 -80, 158 -80, 180 -80, 180 -64.7))";
474    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktP));
475    assertEquals(
476        "((decimallatitude >= -80.0 AND decimallatitude <= -38.3 AND (decimallongitude >= -180.0 AND decimallongitude <= 180.0)) AND contains('"
477            + wktP
478            + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
479        query);
480
481    // A multipolygon around the Pacific and Indian oceans, split over the antimeridian
482    String wktM =
483        "MULTIPOLYGON (((180 51.83076923076923, 180 -63, 35 -63, 60 -9, 127 1, 157 49, 180 51.83076923076923)), ((-180 -63, -180 51.83076923076923, -138 57, -127 39, -112 18, -92 13, -84 1, -77 -63, -169 -63, -180 -63)))";
484    String bbox =
485        "(decimallatitude >= -63.0 AND decimallatitude <= 57.0 AND (decimallongitude >= 35.0 OR decimallongitude <= -77.0))";
486    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wktM));
487    assertEquals(
488        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
489        query);
490
491    // The same polygon, as portal16 produces it.
492    // Note the result still contains the multipolygon.
493    String wkt16 =
494        "POLYGON((35.0 -63.0, 191.0 -63.0, 283.0 -63.0, 276.0 1.0, 268.0 13.0, 248.0 18.0, 233.0 39.0, 222.0 57.0, 157.0 49.0, 127.0 1.0, 60.0 -9.0, 35.0 -63.0))";
495    query = visitor.buildQuery(new WithinPredicate(wkt16));
496    assertEquals(
497        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
498        query);
499
500    // A polygon around the Pacific, as Wicket draws it:
501    String wktWk =
502        "POLYGON((157.0 49.0,127.0 1.0,60.0 -9.0,35.0 -63.0,-169.0 -63.0,-77.0 -63.0,-84.0 1.0,-92.0 13.0,-112.0 18.0,-127.0 39.0,-138.0 57.0,157.0 49.0))";
503    assertEquals(
504        "(" + bbox + " AND contains('" + wktM + "', decimallatitude, decimallongitude) = TRUE)",
505        query);
506  }

597  @Test
598  public void testPartialDates() throws QueryBuildingException {
599    testPartialDate("2021-10-25T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-26T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-25");
600    testPartialDate("2014-10-01T00:00:00Z", "2014-11-01T00:00:00Z", "2014-10");
601    testPartialDate("1936-01-01T00:00:00Z", "1937-01-01T00:00:00Z", "1936");
602  }

604  @Test
605  public void testDateRanges() throws QueryBuildingException {
606    testPartialDate("2021-10-25T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-26T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-25,2021-10-25");
607    testPartialDate("2021-10-25T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-27T00:00:00Z", "2021-10-25,2021-10-26");
608    testPartialDate("2014-05-01T00:00:00Z", "2014-07-01T00:00:00Z", "2014-05,2014-06");
609    testPartialDate("1936-01-01T00:00:00Z", "1941-01-01T00:00:00Z", "1936,1940");
610    testPartialDate("1940-01-01T00:00:00Z", null, "1940,*");
611    testPartialDate(null, "1941-01-01T00:00:00Z", "*,1940");
612    testPartialDate(null, null, "*,*");
613  }
614
615  @Test
616  public void testDateComparisons() throws QueryBuildingException {
617    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000", false);
618    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
619    assertEquals(
620        String.format(
621            "(lastinterpreted >= %s AND lastinterpreted < %s)",
622            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli(),
623            Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
624        query);
625
626    // Include the range
627    p = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000");
628    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
629    assertEquals(
630        String.format("lastinterpreted < %s", Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
631        query);
632
633    p = new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000");
634    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
635    assertEquals(
636        String.format(
637            "lastinterpreted >= %s", Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
638        query);
639
640    // Exclude the range
641    p = new LessThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000");
642    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
643    assertEquals(
644        String.format("lastinterpreted < %s", Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
645        query);
646
647    p = new GreaterThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000");
648    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
649    assertEquals(
650        String.format(
651            "lastinterpreted >= %s", Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
652        query);
653  }
654
655  @Test
656  public void testDateRangeComparisons() throws QueryBuildingException {
657    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01-02", false);
658    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
659    assertEquals(
660        String.format(
661            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
662            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
663            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
664        query);
665
666    p = new InPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, Arrays.asList("2000-01-02"), false);
667    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
668    assertEquals(
669        String.format(
670            "((eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s))",
671            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
672            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
673        query);
674
675    p =
676        new InPredicate<>(
677            OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, Arrays.asList("2000-01-02", "2024-01-17"), false);
678    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
679    assertEquals(
680        String.format(
681            "((eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s) OR (eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s))",
682            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
683            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
684            Instant.parse("2024-01-17T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
685            Instant.parse("2024-01-18T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
686        query);
687
688    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01-02,2000-01-04", false);
689    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
690    assertEquals(
691        String.format(
692            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
693            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
694            Instant.parse("2000-01-05T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
695        query);
696
697    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01", false);
698    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
699    assertEquals(
700        String.format(
701            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
702            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
703            Instant.parse("2000-02-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
704        query);
705
706    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01,2000-03", false);
707    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
708    assertEquals(
709        String.format(
710            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
711            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
712            Instant.parse("2000-04-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
713        query);
714
715    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000", false);
716    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
717    assertEquals(
718        String.format(
719            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
720            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
721            Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
722        query);
723
724    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000,2001", false);
725    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
726    assertEquals(
727        String.format(
728            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
729            Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
730            Instant.parse("2002-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
731        query);
732
733    // Include the range (for the or-equal-to)
734    p = new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000");
735    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
736    assertEquals(
737        String.format("eventdategte < %s", Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
738        query);
739
740    p = new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000");
741    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
742    assertEquals(
743        String.format("eventdatelte >= %s", Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
744        query);
745
746    // Exclude the range
747    p = new LessThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000");
748    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
749    assertEquals(
750        String.format("eventdategte < %s", Instant.parse("2000-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
751        query);
752
753    p = new GreaterThanPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000");
754    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
755    assertEquals(
756        String.format("eventdatelte >= %s", Instant.parse("2001-01-01T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
757        query);
758  }
759
760  /** Reusable method to test partial dates, i.e., dates with the format: yyyy, yyyy-MM. */
761  private void testPartialDate(String expectedFrom, String expectedTo, String value)
762      throws QueryBuildingException {
763    Range<Instant> range =
764        Range.closed(
765            expectedFrom == null ? null : Instant.parse(expectedFrom),
766            expectedTo == null ? null : Instant.parse(expectedTo));
767
768    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, value, false);
769    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
770
771    if (!range.hasUpperBound() && !range.hasLowerBound()) {
772      assertEquals("", query);
773    } else if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
774      assertEquals(
775          String.format("(lastinterpreted >= %s)", range.lowerEndpoint().toEpochMilli()), query);
776    } else if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
777      assertEquals(
778          String.format("(lastinterpreted < %s)", range.upperEndpoint().toEpochMilli()), query);
779    } else {
780      assertEquals(
781          String.format(
782              "(lastinterpreted >= %s AND lastinterpreted < %s)",
783              range.lowerEndpoint().toEpochMilli(), range.upperEndpoint().toEpochMilli()),
784          query);
785    }
786  }
787
788  /** Some dates in HDFS are a number of seconds, others a number of milliseconds. */
789  @Test
790  public void testDateMagnitude() throws QueryBuildingException {
791    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE, "2000-01-02", false);
792    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
793    assertEquals(
794        String.format(
795            "(eventdategte >= %s AND eventdatelte < %s)",
796            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
797            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
798        query);
799
800    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.LAST_INTERPRETED, "2000-01-02", false);
801    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
802    assertEquals(
803        String.format(
804            "(lastinterpreted >= %s AND lastinterpreted < %s)",
805            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli(),
806            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").toEpochMilli()),
807        query);
808
809    p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.MODIFIED, "2000-01-02", false);
810    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
811    assertEquals(
812        String.format(
813            "(modified >= %s AND modified < %s)",
814            Instant.parse("2000-01-02T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond(),
815            Instant.parse("2000-01-03T00:00:00Z").getEpochSecond()),
816        query);
817  }

819  @Test
820  public void testIntRanges() throws QueryBuildingException {
821
822    String value = "1990,2011";
823    Range<Integer> range = SearchTypeValidator.parseIntegerRange(value);
824
825    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, value, false);
826    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
827
828    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
829      assertEquals(String.format("year >= %s", range.lowerEndpoint().intValue()), query);
830    } else if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
831      assertEquals(String.format("year <= %s", range.upperEndpoint().intValue()), query);
832    } else {
833      assertEquals(
834          String.format(
835              "((year >= %s) AND (year <= %s))",
836              range.lowerEndpoint().intValue(), range.upperEndpoint().intValue()),
837          query);
838    }
839  }
840
841  @Test
842  public void testIntInclusiveRangeWithRangePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
843
844    RangeValue rangeValue = new RangeValue("1990", null, "2011", null);
845    Predicate p = new RangePredicate(OccurrenceSearchParameter.YEAR, rangeValue);
846    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
847    assertEquals(
848        String.format(
849            "((year >= %1$s) AND (year <= %2$s))",
850            Integer.parseInt(rangeValue.getGte()), Integer.parseInt(rangeValue.getLte())),
851        query);
852  }

900  /** Reusable method to test number ranges. */
901  private void testDoubleRange(String value) throws QueryBuildingException {
902    Range<Double> range = SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(value);
903
904    Predicate p = new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ELEVATION, value, false);
905    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
906
907    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
908      assertEquals(String.format("elevation >= %s", range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue()), query);
909    } else if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
910      assertEquals(String.format("elevation <= %s", range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue()), query);
911    } else {
912      assertEquals(
913          String.format(
914              "((elevation >= %s) AND (elevation <= %s))",
915              range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue(), range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue()),
916          query);
917    }
918  }

935      assertEquals(String.format("year >= %s", range.lowerEndpoint().intValue()), query);
936    } else if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
937      assertEquals(String.format("year <= %s", range.upperEndpoint().intValue()), query);
938    } else {

946
947  @Test
948  public void testIssues() throws QueryBuildingException {
949    // EqualsPredicate
950    String query =
951        visitor.buildQuery(
952            new EqualsPredicate<>(
953                OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK", false));
954    assertEquals("stringArrayContains(issue,'TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK',true)", query);
955
956    // InPredicate
957    query =
958        visitor.buildQuery(
959            new InPredicate<>(
960                OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE,
961                List.of("TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK", "TAXON_MATCH_NONE"),
962                false));
963    assertEquals(
964        "(stringArrayContains(issue,'TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK',true) OR stringArrayContains(issue,'TAXON_MATCH_NONE',true))",
965        query);
966
967    // LikePredicate
968    try {
969      new LikePredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK", false);
970      fail();
971    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
972    }
973
974    // Not
975    query =
976        visitor.buildQuery(
977            new NotPredicate(
978                new EqualsPredicate<>(
979                    OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK", false)));
980    assertEquals("NOT stringArrayContains(issue,'TAXON_MATCH_HIGHERRANK',true)", query);
981
982    // Not disjunction
983    query =
984        visitor.buildQuery(
985            new NotPredicate(
986                new DisjunctionPredicate(
987                    List.of(
988                        new EqualsPredicate<>(
989                            OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "COORDINATE_INVALID", false),
990                        new EqualsPredicate<>(
991                            OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE", false),
992                        new EqualsPredicate<>(
993                            OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "ZERO_COORDINATE", false),
994                        new EqualsPredicate<>(
995                            OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE, "RECORDED_DATE_INVALID", false)))));
996    assertEquals(
997        "NOT (stringArrayContains(issue,'COORDINATE_INVALID',true) OR stringArrayContains(issue,'COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE',true) OR stringArrayContains(issue,'ZERO_COORDINATE',true) OR stringArrayContains(issue,'RECORDED_DATE_INVALID',true))",
998        query);
999
1000    // IsNotNull
1001    query = visitor.buildQuery(new IsNotNullPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE));
1002    assertEquals("(issue IS NOT NULL AND size(issue) > 0)", query);
1003  }
1004
1005  @Test
1006  public void testAllParamsExist() {
1007    List<Predicate> predicates = new ArrayList<>();
1008    for (OccurrenceSearchParameter param : OccurrenceSearchParameter.values()) {
1009      String value = "7";
1010      if (OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOMETRY == param) {
1011        value = "POLYGON ((30 10, 10 20, 20 40, 40 40, 30 10))";
1012        predicates.add(new WithinPredicate(value));
1013      } else if (UUID.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1014        value = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
1015      } else if (Boolean.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1016        value = "true";
1017      } else if (Country.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1018        value = Country.GERMANY.getIso2LetterCode();
1019      } else if (Language.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1020        value = Language.GERMAN.getIso2LetterCode();
1021      } else if (Enum.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1022        Enum<?>[] values = ((Class<Enum>) param.type()).getEnumConstants();
1023        value = values[0].name();
1024      } else if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1025        value = "2014-01-23";
1026      } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
1027        value = "2014-01-23,2015-05";
1028      } else if (OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEO_DISTANCE == param) {
1029        predicates.add(new GeoDistancePredicate("10", "20", "10km"));
1030      }
1031
1032      if (OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOMETRY != param
1033          && OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEO_DISTANCE != param) {
1034        predicates.add(new EqualsPredicate<>(param, value, false));
1035      }
1036    }
1037    ConjunctionPredicate and = new ConjunctionPredicate(predicates);
1038    try {
1039      visitor.buildQuery(and);
1040    } catch (QueryBuildingException e) {
1041      fail(e);
1042    }
1043  }
1044
1045  @Test
1046  public void testVocabularies() {
1047    Arrays.stream(OccurrenceSearchParameter.values())
1048        .filter(
1049            p ->
1050                Optional.ofNullable(visitor.term(p))
1051                    .map(SQLColumnsUtils::isVocabulary)
1052                    .orElse(false))
1053        .forEach(
1054            param -> {
1055              try {
1056                String hiveQueryField = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(visitor.term(param));
1057
1058                // EqualsPredicate
1059                String query = visitor.buildQuery(new EqualsPredicate<>(param, "value_1", false));
1060                assertEquals("stringArrayContains(" + hiveQueryField + ",'value_1',false)", query);
1061
1062                // InPredicate
1063                query =
1064                    visitor.buildQuery(
1065                        new InPredicate<>(param, List.of("value_1", "value_2"), false));
1066                assertEquals(
1067                    "(stringArrayContains("
1068                        + hiveQueryField
1069                        + ",'value_1',false) OR stringArrayContains("
1070                        + hiveQueryField
1071                        + ",'value_2',false))",
1072                    query);
1073
1074                // LikePredicate
1075                query = visitor.buildQuery(new LikePredicate<>(param, "value_*", false));
1076                assertEquals("lower(" + hiveQueryField + ") LIKE lower('value\\_%')", query);
1077
1078                // Not
1079                query =
1080                    visitor.buildQuery(
1081                        new NotPredicate(new EqualsPredicate<>(param, "value_1", false)));
1082                assertEquals(
1083                    "NOT stringArrayContains(" + hiveQueryField + ",'value_1',false)", query);
1084
1085                // IsNotNull
1086                query = visitor.buildQuery(new IsNotNullPredicate<>(param));
1087                assertEquals(
1088                    "(" + hiveQueryField + " IS NOT NULL AND size(" + hiveQueryField + ") > 0)",
1089                    query);
1090
1091                // IsNull
1092                query = visitor.buildQuery(new IsNullPredicate<>(param));
1093                if (visitor.isSQLArray(param)) {
1094                  assertEquals(
1095                      " (" + hiveQueryField + " IS NULL OR size(" + hiveQueryField + ") = 0) ",
1096                      query);
1097                } else {
1098                  assertEquals(hiveQueryField + " IS NULL", query);
1099                }
1100
1101              } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
1102                throw new RuntimeException(ex);
1103              }
1104            });
1105  }

1107  @Test
1108  public void testGreaterThanEqualsIncludingNull() {
1109    GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<OccurrenceSearchParameter> distanceFromCentroidPredicate =
1110        new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
1111            OccurrenceSearchParameter.DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS, "10");
1112    try {
1113      String query = visitor.buildQuery(distanceFromCentroidPredicate);
1114      assertEquals(
1115          "(distancefromcentroidinmeters >= 10 OR distancefromcentroidinmeters IS NULL)", query);
1116    } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
1117      fail();
1118    }
1119  }

1125            OccurrenceSearchParameter.DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS, "10");

1135  @Test
1136  public void testDisjunctionGreaterThanEqualsIncludingNull() {
1137    GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<OccurrenceSearchParameter> distanceFromCentroidPredicate =
1138        new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
1139            OccurrenceSearchParameter.DISTANCE_FROM_CENTROID_IN_METERS, "10");
1140    EqualsPredicate<OccurrenceSearchParameter> equalsPredicate =
1141        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY, "6", false);
1142    DisjunctionPredicate disjunctionPredicate =
1143        new DisjunctionPredicate(Arrays.asList(equalsPredicate, distanceFromCentroidPredicate));
1144    try {
1145      String query = visitor.buildQuery(disjunctionPredicate);
1146      assertEquals(
1147          "(((stringArrayContains(classifications['defaultChecklistKey'], '6', true))) OR ((distancefromcentroidinmeters >= 10 OR distancefromcentroidinmeters IS NULL)))",
1148          query);
1149    } catch (QueryBuildingException ex) {
1150      fail();
1151    }
1152  }

1154  @Test
1155  public void testGeoTimePredicate() throws QueryBuildingException {
1156    Predicate predicate =
1157        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, "12", false);
1158    String query = visitor.buildQuery(predicate);
1159    assertEquals("12 > geologicaltime.gt AND 12 <= geologicaltime.lte", query);
1160
1161    Predicate rangePredicate =
1162        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, "12,15", false);
1163    query = visitor.buildQuery(rangePredicate);
1164    assertEquals("geologicaltime.gt >= 12.0 AND geologicaltime.lte <= 15.0", query);
1165
1166    rangePredicate =
1167        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, "12,*", false);
1168    query = visitor.buildQuery(rangePredicate);
1169    assertEquals("geologicaltime.gt >= 12.0", query);
1170
1171    rangePredicate =
1172        new EqualsPredicate<>(OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME, "*,15", false);
1173    query = visitor.buildQuery(rangePredicate);
1174    assertEquals("geologicaltime.lte <= 15.0", query);
1175  }

1313  @Test
1314  public void testHumboldtEventDuration() throws QueryBuildingException {
1315    Predicate p =
1316        new EqualsPredicate<>(
1317            EventSearchParameter.HUMBOLDT_EVENT_DURATION_VALUE_IN_MINUTES, "1", false);
1318    String query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
1319    assertEquals("h.humboldteventdurationvalueinminutes = 1", query);
1320
1321    p =
1322        new EqualsPredicate<>(
1323            EventSearchParameter.HUMBOLDT_EVENT_DURATION_VALUE_IN_MINUTES, "1,3", false);
1324    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
1325    assertEquals(
1326        "((h.humboldteventdurationvalueinminutes >= 1.0) AND (h.humboldteventdurationvalueinminutes <= 3.0))",
1327        query);
1328
1329    p =
1330        new EqualsPredicate<>(
1331            EventSearchParameter.HUMBOLDT_EVENT_DURATION_VALUE_IN_MINUTES, "1,*", false);
1332    query = visitor.buildQuery(p);
1333    assertEquals("h.humboldteventdurationvalueinminutes >= 1.0", query);
1334  }
